name: WTF - a game to play in the the dark
name_original: WTF - a game to play in the the dark
description:
hi there! 

i'm a "new born" brazilian developer. I really hope you enjoy the game just like my friends did.

It was really nice to make this game, and it is a really  good experience to play this at the dark, but i don't know why.

but i know that, if you download this, you will help me to release some free games i have been working on. follow me to be the first one to know when i will release another game and you will for sure listen to some good musics, really i love the musics in this game. i know, i know... talking like that about the musics in my own game can be kinda rude, but i really enjoy then...

(that's not a game-play or something , read below...)

did you know what the video above means? No? me neither, but you can think in something right? that what my games are about, i don't give the answer you can thing in them by yourself.
